item.title: Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection launches February 20
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Five-game collection dated.

Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection will launch for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on February 20, publisher Limited Run Games and developer Mighty Rabbit Studios announced.

Here is an overview of the collection, via Limited Run Games:

About

Hello, boys and girls. This is your old pal Stinky Wizzleteats. This is a game about a whale. No! This is a game about being happy! That’s right! It’s the Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection!

Hey, man! Ren & Stimpy are back in a collection of games that will satisfy even the sickest little monkeys. Don’t be an eediot—add this to your game library today, you filthy swine!

Included Games

Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection includes:

  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Space Cadet Adventures (1992, portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Veediots! (1993, 16-bit / portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Buckeroo$! (1993, 8-bit / 16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Time Warp (1994, 16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Fire Dogs (1994, 16-bit)

Key Features

  • Save Any Where and Any Time – this helpful feature will allow you to take a litter box break and return right where you left off!
  • Rewind – If you’re sucked into the hideous vortex of a black hole, don’t fear – you can rewind and try again!
  • Museum Viewer – Nothing could be more fun than viewing original packaging and manuals for each of the included games!
